attributes.action: Get rid of xl bully law
attributes.additional_details: Because your abusing animals that are innocent, there are more serious problems then this. We should be focusing on other things like crime and our prisons. So we should do an owner and dog training so there’s no more issues like this.
attributes.background: Get rid of the xl bully law

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Bad owners are to blame not the breed - don't ban the XL bully: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643611

Bring back a Dog Licence: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643650

Introduce licences, mandatory training and annual vet visits to own a dog: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643739

Make training your dog with an approved scheme a legal requirement: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643946
